attributes.action: travel costs should starts from £1 and everything less expensive
attributes.additional_details: It has been difficult to stay in london since everything is pricy if not possible to make anything less expensive at least make the travel costs cheap
attributes.background: Government should make everything less pricy instead of making everything expensive day by day. Even if it is still increasing then increase minimum wage of working people

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you are concerned about the price of things, but we are not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
